metadata.title: Pav Bhaji Recipe | Street Style Pav Bhaji | बाज़ार से भी स्वादिष्ट पाव भाजी | Chef Sanjyot Keer
metadata.description:
Full Written recipe for Pav bhaji

Prep time: 30-35 minutes
Cooking time: 30-35 minutes
Serves: 7-8 people

Pav bhaji masala
Ingredients:
● Coriander seeds 5 tbsp
● Cumin seeds 3 tbsp
● Cloves 20-22 nos.
● Star anise 4-5 nos.
● Black cardamom 5-6 nos. 
● Cinnamon 3-4 sticks
● Bay leaf 4-5 nos.
● Kashmiri red chillies 20-25 nos.
● Fennel seeds 3 tbsp
● Kasuri methi 2 tbsp
● Turmeric powder ½ tsp
● Dry ginger powder ½ tsp
● Hing 1 tsp
● Kaala namak 1 tsp
● Aamchur powder 1 tbsp
● Salt 1 tbsp

Pre
